name: puggle
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a type of dog that is a cross (= a mixture) between a pug and a beagle: Designer dogs like a puggle can cost more than purebred dogs.
Ricardo38/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
a baby platypus or echidna: The photo shows a platypus baby, or puggle. The young of the echidna is called a puggle.
IainStych/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesThe puggle combines the cuddly qualities of the pug with the energy of a beagle.People are now breeding pugs to any old foxhound and selling them as puggles, at puggle prices. Mark said his puggle, Ticker, has both beagle and pug traits.
